thread.title: emit issues samples

comments.text: this version won't emit the play ship from the cyan triangle when you press the red start button at the bottom on the grey panel.
this is the player ship that is supposed to be emitting. i think this is the correct version of it.
this is the earlier version that does emit the player ship, but the enemy ship that comes from the top doesn't die when touching the bottom liquid orange bar!  its red shot does.
this is the enemy ship that doesn't die touching liquid. it's not stricter physics sync like the player ship is, but still axes locked.

thread.latestCommentText: this is the enemy ship that doesn't die touching liquid. it's not stricter physics sync like the player ship is, but still axes locked.
